snippet: With six-times champion Roger Federer absent, Swiss fans dotted around London's O2 Arena were rooting for Stan Wawrinka at the ATP World Tour Finals on Monday but left feeling short-changed after their man was thrashed by Kei Nishikori....
lead_paragraph: With six-times champion Roger Federer absent, Swiss fans dotted around London's O2 Arena were rooting for Stan Wawrinka at the ATP World Tour Finals on Monday but left feeling short-changed after their man was thrashed by Kei Nishikori.

headline.print_headline: Wawrinka Proves Poor Substitute for Federer in Nishikori Loss
headline.main: Wawrinka Proves Poor Substitute for Federer in Nishikori Loss
